name: sickchill
description: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) is an Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.

volumes.description: this will store config on the docker host
this will store any downloaded data on the docker host
this will allow sickchill to view what you already have

ports.description: will map the container's port 8081 to port 8081 on the host

title: Sickchill
